attributes.action: Force Royal Mail to accept The Union offer to resolve the dispute at Acas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand that Royal Mail accept the Unions offer to resolve the dispute at Acas, before irreparable damage is done to countless Internet based mail order businesses.
There is no excuse for not seeking independent arbitration in this matter.
 Royal Mail is a publicly owned company and we the public demand action now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
